full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYAS PA'I BSTAN BCOS TSAD MA RNAM 'GREL GYI TSIG LE'UR BYAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
translator_(орчуулагч): SU BHU TI SHR'I SHAN TI, BLO GROS,
publisher_(хэвлэсэн_буюу_бүтээсэн_хийд_б: CHOS GRVA CHEN PO BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @084A *, ,TSAD MA RNAM 'GREL GYI TSIG LE'UR BYAS PA 'DI NI, YUL LHO PHYOGS KYI RGYUD DU BYUNG BA GZHUNG LUGS NGAN PA THAMS CAD CHES SHIN TU 'KHRUL BAR 'JUG PA SNYAN PA'I GRAGS PAS SA'I STENG MA LUS PAR KHYAB PA 'GRAN ZLA MED PA'I MKHAS PA CHEN PO DPAL CHOS KYI GRAGS PAS MDZAD PA RDZOGS SO, ,RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO SU BHU TI SHR'I SHAN TI DANG, BOD KYI LO TZTSA BA DGE SLONG DGE BA'I BLO GROS KYIS BSGYUR, ,DPAL LDAN DAM PA'I LAS LA MNGON DGES PA, ,SMAD MED CHE BA'I BDAG CAN RGYAL PO MCHOG ,DGE BA'I THUGS MNGA' DES PAS SKYONG BA, MI YI BDAG PO DBANG SDE'I BKAS BSKUL NAS, BRTZON LDAN LHAG PAR DPYOD LDAN 'CHAD PO DANG, NYAN PO RGOL DANG PHYIR RGOL DON NGES DANG, ,'BREL GTAM DGA' STON RGYA CHEN MYONG BYA'I PHYIR, ,'DZAM GLING MKHAS PA'I RGYAN GYUR RGYAN 'DI BSGYUR, ,LTA NGAN KUN SEL GNYIS SU MED PA YI, ,DON DAM RNAM DPYOD LHUR LEN BSTAN BCOS 'DI, ,GZHUNG MANG DON DKA' BSGRUB PAR DKA' NA YANG, ,'BRAS BU CHE PHYIR 'BAD PAR RIGS PA YIN, ,LOG PA'I RGYU PHYOGS RJES SU GZHOL GYUR BA, ,LTA BA CHU BO BZLOG PAR DKA' MOD KYI, , YANG @084B DAG RIGS PAS LEGS PAR BRDA SPRAD NA, , 'GA' YI YID LA CI STE 'BAB MI 'GYUR, ,SGRA DON GNYIS KA NYAMS SU BDER LON TE, MUN SPRUL GYIS NI MA BSLAD LEGS BSGYUR BA, ,SNGON GYI SGYUR BYED DAM PA DE DAG GI , ,,DRI TZAM BRO BA DA LHA KHO BOR ZAD, ,DPAL LDAN KHA CHE'I RIGS PA PA'I, ,GTZUG GI NOR BU SKAL LDAN NI, ,RGYAL PO ZHES BYA LA THOS NAS, ,BLO LDAN BZANG POS 'DI BSGYUR RO, ,GRONG BYED CHEN PO DPE MED KYI SHAR PHYOGS NA YUL 'KHOR LO'I 'DZIN PA ZHES BYA BA GRUB PA'I GNAS SU GRAGS PA'I 'DABS, ,RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I ZHING ZHES BYA BAR, ,KHA CHE'I PAndI TA CHEN PO SKAL LDAN RGYAL PO DANG, ,BOD KYI LOTZTSA BA CHEN PO DGE SLONG BLO LDAN SHES RAB KYIS BSGYUR BA'O, ,DUS PHYIS SA'I STENG NA 'GRAN ZLA THAMS CAD DANG BRAL PA'I MKHAS PA BSOD SNYOMS PA CHEN PO SH'AKYA SHR'I BHA TRA LA SOGS PA RNAMS DANG, ,SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG KUN DGA' RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG POS BSGYUR CING ZHUS TE GTAN LA PHAB PA'O, ,CHOS KYI GRAGS PA'I GSUNG RAB DRI MA MED, ,RIGS PA'I MTHAR THUG TSAD MA RNAM 'GREL 'DI, SGRA DON JI BZHIN BLO YIS LEGS RTOGS NAS, ,STON PA GANGS CAN 'DI NA KHO BO TZAM, ,MANGGA LAm, ,` SVA STI PRA DZA BHYA: THABS DANG SHES RAB CHU GTER LAS 'KHRUNGS SKU BZHI'I BANG RIM MNGON PAR MTHO, ,MKHYEN BRTZE NYI ZLA'I RNA RGYAN 'BAR BAS LUS CAN GDUNG PA'I MUN PA SEL, ,RGYAL SRAS GSER RI'I 'PHRENG BAS YONGS BSKOR THOS SGROGS MKHA' LDING ROL PA'I GNAS, ,RNAM 'DREN KUN GYIS PAD DKAR LTAR BSNGAGS THUB DBANG BU RAM SHING PAR 'DUD, ,BSLAB GSUM LUS KYI STOBS @085A *, ,ZHUS DAG BYED MKHAN RAB 'BYAMS PA BLO BZANG 'JIGS MED, ,DKA' BCU BLO BZANG DKON MCHOG ,DKA' BCU NGAG DBANG CHOS 'PHEL, ,DPAR BRKOS PA DKON MCHOG RGYAL MTSAN, NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN, ,BLO BZANG BSTAN PA, ,'JAM DBYANGS TSUL KHRIMS, PHUN TSOGS RGYA MTSO, ,BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS, ,DKON MCHOG NYI MA, ,NGAG DBANG NYI MA, BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS, ,NGAG DBANG BKRA SHIS RNAMS DANG, ,GANG CI'I DO DAM DPAR GNYER BA DGE SLONG SHES RAB DAR RGYAS KYIS BGYIS TE, ,MDO SMAD KYI CHOS GRVA CHEN PO BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU PAR DU SGRUB PA'I TSE, ,RIGS PA SMRA BA DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG POS SBYAR BA'O, ,)
